sentences.en: Exchange and allocating is the intermediate agency of concatenate production and consumption.
sentences.cn: 交换和分配是连结生产和消费的中间媒介.

sentences.en: For the no-arguments case, we take the sequence [0 1] and concatenate it to an expression.
sentences.cn: 对于没有参数的情况，我们获取序列 [0 1] 并将它连到一个表达式。

sentences.en: Having a few among them is concatenate world each commerce of big haven advocate course.
sentences.cn: 其中有一些是连结世界各大港口的贸易主航线。

trans.tran_en: to link or join together, esp in a chain or series
